column2: sine = Opposite x Hypotenuse &  cosine = Adjacent x Hypotenuse &  tangent = Opposite x Adjacent
column3: sine = Opposite/Hypotenuse &  cosine = Adjacent/Hypotenuse &  tangent = Opposite/Adjacent
column4: sine = Opposite x Hypotenuse &  cosine = Area x Hypotenuse &  tangent = Opposite x Area
column5: sine = Opposite/Height &  cosine = Adjacent/Height &  tangent = Opposite/Adjacent
